name: MenuScalePatch
author: NotAKidoS
description:
Corrects MM and QM position when avatar is being scaled.

Optional setting to enable Independent Head Turn while in menus.
Optional setting to force menus to always follow player.
changelog:
- Fixed hitching & potential crash when opening menu after a long time of it being closed. Don't disable CohtmlView, only enable it.
- Let game update menu position while its closed.
- Tweaked independent head turn handling to ensure menu is correctly positioned on recenter if PlayerAnchorMenus is disabled.
- Undo change to which transform to parent menu anchors.
